<<<api>>>: ProgressDialog.dismiss
<<<code>>>: You are missing the code to show the ProgressDialog in your AsyncTask. Add the following code in your onPreExecute() method:
ProgressDialog progressDialog = new ProgressDialog(context);
progressDialog.setMessage("Downloading...");
progressDialog.setIndeterminate(false);
progressDialog.setMax(100);
progressDialog.setProgressStyle(ProgressDialog.STYLE_HORIZONTAL);
progressDialog.setCancelable(true);
progressDialog.show();

Then, in your doInBackground() method, update the progress of the ProgressDialog using publishProgress() method. Add the following code inside your while loop:
int progress = (int) ((total * 100) / lenghtOfFile);
publishProgress("" + progress);

Finally, in your onProgressUpdate() method, update the progress of the ProgressDialog. Add the following code:
progressDialog.setProgress(Integer.parseInt(progress[0]));

Make sure to dismiss the ProgressDialog in your onPostExecute() method. Add the following code:
progressDialog.dismiss();

Also, make sure you have the necessary permissions in your manifest file to access external storage.
